content: Add members for joint editing in the room

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the option to add members for joint editing in a room. It appears in a button or dialog related to sharing and inviting users to edit files. Translators should provide a clear and concise description of this action in various languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'δωμάτιο' (domatio) is in the singular form. The English phrase 'in the room' implies a plural or a more general context, so the Greek should reflect that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Προσθέστε μέλη για κοινή επεξεργασία στα δωμάτια

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Añada miembros del portal para la edición colaborativa en la sala' is too literal and uses technical terms that may not be clear to all users. 'Portal' is not necessary and 'edición colaborativa' is a bit formal. It doesn't fully capture the simplicity of 'Add members for joint editing'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Añade miembros para editar la sala juntos

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ajoutez des membres de l'espace pour l'édition conjointe dans la salle' is a bit too literal and doesn't flow naturally in French. 'de l'espace' is redundant and 'dans la salle' is unnecessary as the context already implies a room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ajoutez des membres pour l'édition collaborative.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ավելացնել պորտալի անդամներ սենյակում համատեղ խմբագրման համար" is a bit literal and not the most natural way to express 'Add members for joint editing in the room' in Armenian. 'Portal members' is not necessarily implied in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ավելացնել անդամներ սենյակում համատեղ խմբագրման համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'սենյակում' (senyakum) is correct, it might be more concise and commonly used to say 'միասին խմբագրելու համար' (miasin khmbagrelu hamar) instead of 'համատեղ խմբագրման համար' to convey the purpose of joint editing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ավելացնել անդամներ սենյակում միասին խմբագրելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition 'del' is incorrect. It should be 'per'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aggiungi membri per la modifica congiunta nella stanza

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit too literal and formal. '共同編集用のメンバーを追加してください' implies a request or instruction. A more natural and user-friendly translation would convey the meaning of adding members for collaborative editing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームで共同編集を行うためにメンバーを追加できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '룸에서 공동 편집을 하기 위해 멤버 추가하세요' is a bit literal and not the most natural phrasing in Korean. It translates to 'Add members to do collaborative editing in the room.' A more natural phrasing would emphasize the invitation aspect.
While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for better readability and flow in Korean. It's a bit long and slightly awkward.

The translation 'ເພີ່ມສະມາຊິກເຂົ້າຮ່ວມກວດແກ້ຮ່ວມກັນໃນຫ້ອງ' is a bit literal and could be more natural. While technically correct, 'ກວດແກ້' (check/correct) doesn't fully convey the concept of 'joint editing'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພີ່ມສະມາຊິກເຂົ້າຮ່ວມແກ້ໄຂໃນຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Adicione membros do portal para edição conjunta na sala" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "Add members for joint editing in the room." "Portal" implies a specific platform, which isn't specified in the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adicione membros para edição colaborativa na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'කාමරයේ' is spelled correctly, but it could be more naturally phrased. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal in this context.
The phrasing 'කාමරයේ ඒකාබද්ධ සංස්කරණය සඳහා' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would remove the 'untuk' (for).

While 'ඒකාබද්ධ සංස්කරණය' literally translates to 'joint editing', it's a very literal and not the most natural way to express this in Sinhala for a user interface. A more common and easily understood phrase would be better.
